stadium.name: The Old Fort
stadium.description: The team plays within the crumbling, stone-ringed ruins of an ancient hill-fort. The 'runes' are just old, weathered carvings on the standing stones that serve as obstacles.

stats.pregame_ritual: Reciting the names of legendary Trollball players of the past.
Getting a teammate to punch them in the shoulder, hard.
Tracing an invisible, complex sigil over their heart.
Patting every beast of burden they see on the way to the match.
Collecting a pebble from every field they've ever played on.
Leading the team in a synchronized chant that slowly gets louder.
Spitting into their own hand and then slapping their face with it.
Reciting the names of legendary Trollball players of the past.
Braiding their hair into tight, battle-ready rows.
A toast of goat's milk to the health of their rivals.
Sharing a ceremonial, non-alcoholic grog from a communal cup.

stadium.name: The Serpent's Pass
stadium.location: Zmeigorod, just west of the lumber mill
stadium.description: Has to be periodically rebuilt whenever the old stadium starts sinking into the swamp. Don‚Äôt worry about it.

stats.pregame_ritual: Rubbing a foul-smelling local mushroom on their elbows for flexibility.
Chugging a raw egg, shell and all.
Performing a series of aggressive, theatrical poses.
Polishing their helmet with a live snail for good luck.
Tensing every muscle in their body at once, then releasing.
Performing a series of aggressive, theatrical poses.
Clapping their hands a prime number of times.
Sharing a ceremonial, non-alcoholic grog from a communal cup.
Looking each teammate in the eye and giving a single, firm nod.
Giving the Trollball a heroic backstory before each game.
Painting a single, matching stripe of mud on each player's face.
Chugging a raw egg, shell and all.
Performing a series of aggressive, theatrical poses.

Tensing every muscle in their body at once, then releasing.
Performing a series of aggressive, theatrical poses.

preGame:
Hello out there in Trollball land! This is your favorite demon of the airwaves, Nok the Corrupter, coming to you live from the mossy, fog-drenched stones of **The Old Fort** in Kerlauger! üèüÔ∏è We‚Äôve got a real barn-burner on our hands tonight as we kick off the Losers Bracket playoffs! It‚Äôs Game 1 of a Best-of-3 series, and the stakes couldn't be higher‚Äîlose this series, and you‚Äôre packing your bags for the long walk of shame back to reality! The atmosphere is electric, despite the **Dense Fog** rolling in off the hills, making it nearly impossible to see the runes on these ancient standing stones. 

Our visitors today are the darlings of the realm, **The Zmeigorod Snessengers**! üêç The crowd is absolutely deafening for these swamp-dwellers; it seems everyone from the Bog Queen‚Äôs court has made the trip! I just saw **Delija Dowling** in the dugout chugging a raw egg‚Äîshell and all! ü•ö Talk about a protein boost! Meanwhile, their captain **Dare Wynnie** is busy painting mud stripes on everyone‚Äôs faces. It‚Äôs tribal, it‚Äôs messy, and it‚Äôs exactly what I love to see! They‚Äôre looking to bring that Zmeigorod grit to the highlands tonight.

But don't count out the home team, **The Kerlauger Runeguard**! üõ°Ô∏è They‚Äôre playing in their own backyard, even if that backyard is a pile of **Ancient Ruins** with **Uneven Footing** that‚Äôll snap an ankle as soon as look at you! They aren't quite the fan favorites the Snessengers are‚Äîmaybe the White Ravens should've spent less time kidnapping prophets and more time on PR! I caught **Lashondra Niehaus** getting absolutely belted in the shoulder by a teammate just to get the blood flowing. Now that‚Äôs a pre-game ritual I can get behind! Grab your refreshments and stay close to the radio, folks, because the violence is about to begin!
postGame:
Good grief, what a display of athletic carnage! The first game of this playoff series is in the books, and the **Zmeigorod Snessengers** have slithered away with a 4-2 victory over the Kerlauger Runeguard! üêç It was a battle of attrition out there in the fog, and while the Runeguard had the home-field advantage of knowing where the biggest rocks were, they just couldn't withstand the late-game surge from the swamp-folk. 

The action started fast and furious! **Lorilee Aldred** snatched the troll head right out of the gate in Center Field, and after some quick-fire passing, **Benjie Foulk** absolutely nailed a shot from the Away 2-Point zone! üéØ A 2-0 lead for the Runeguard early on had the home crowd‚Äîall twelve of them‚Äîgoing wild! It looked like the Snessengers were reeling from the altitude.

Then came the brutality we all tune in for! **Shepperd Trefler** of the Runeguard decided he‚Äôd had enough of the Snessengers' civic engagement and went on a rampage. He used those spiked gauntlets to absolutely level **Alded Sanjay** and **Dare Wynnie** in back-to-back plays! üí• Both Snessengers were sent to the healer‚Äôs tent before the first half was even halfway through. That's the kind of initiative that makes a demon‚Äôs heart sing!

There was a moment of hope for Zmeigorod when **Arni Griffith**‚Äîwho I‚Äôm told gives the trollball a heroic backstory before every game‚Äîshowed he‚Äôs more than just a storyteller by intercepting a wild pass from Lorilee Aldred! üèà It stopped a certain touchdown and kept the Snessengers in the hunt going into the halftime break. 

After the healers did their magic and everyone was back on the field, the Snessengers finally found their rhythm. **Rose Kluge**, who I saw tensing every muscle in her body like a coiled spring earlier, finally snapped! She found an opening in the Home Field and fired a shot that sailed right through the goal! ü•Ö Just like that, we were tied up at 2-2! 

The momentum had completely shifted. The Runeguard‚Äôs **Johnna Beetner** tried to answer back, but her shot went wide, probably caught in a sudden gust of that thick Kerlauger fog. The Snessengers didn't miss their next chance, though. **Alded Sanjay**, clearly recovered from his earlier trip to the infirmary, took a pass in Center Field and buried another 2-point shot! ‚òÑÔ∏è

The Runeguard tried to get physical again to claw back into it. **Benjie Foulk** lived up to his name by tackling **Gere Cordelie** so hard it left a dent in the turf! Gere was carried off, but the damage was already done. The Snessengers played keep-away for the final minutes, navigating the **Uneven Footing** with the grace of a bog-adder.

You have to feel for the Runeguard; they fought hard, but the popularity of Zmeigorod seems to carry a luck all its own. Maybe if **Dame Terra Monteforte** spent more time coaching and less time digging in the dirt, they‚Äôd have better results! But let's be honest, we're all just here for the injuries, and we got plenty of those today. ü©∏

So, the Snessengers take a 1-0 lead in this Best-of-3 series. They showed incredible resilience, especially after that early deficit. The crowd is absolutely losing their minds, chanting and splashing around in the mud. It's a party in Zmeigorod tonight, I can tell you that much!

As for the Runeguard, they‚Äôre facing elimination in the next game. They‚Äôll need more than just goat's milk toasts from **Gurney Fadiman** to turn this around. They need to find a way to stop the Snessengers' high-flying offense and maybe hope for a rockslide to take out the opposition‚Äôs bench!

Final score: **The Zmeigorod Snessengers 4, The Kerlauger Runeguard 2**. A magnificent display of Trollball at its most chaotic! I‚Äôve been Nok the Corrupter, and I‚Äôll be back for Game 2 to see if the Runeguard can keep their playoff dreams alive or if they‚Äôll be cast into the abyss of the off-season! üéôÔ∏è‚ú®

Don't forget to pay your tabs at Imra‚Äôs bar on the way out, or you might find yourself part of the next ritual sangria! Stay wicked, Osterra!
